Package it.escape.core.server.model.game.cards

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Card  
    ObjectCard  
    SectorCard  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardMatcher
    This class checks if 2 cards are of the same kind, by checking if they have the same classname
    Deck
    This class defines the behaviour of a deck of cards; The data structure is an ArrayList of Card objects; there is also a int counter variable, that keeps track of the number of cards left in the deck; objects are not destroyed and recreated when cards are drawn; instead, the counter variable is decremented.
    DeckMatcher  
    DecksHandler
    This class initializes the decks, which contain different kinds of cards, and makes them visible.
    DeckTest  
    EscapeDeck  
    ObjectDeck  
    SectorDeck
